title: Case Study: SaaS Sales Team Tripled Meetings

content.text: GrowthLoop replaced three SDRs by running SAM across LinkedIn and email. Meetings up 3Ã—, cost per opportunity down 58%, compliance maintained with approval queue.

metadata.displayTitle: Case Study: SaaS Sales Team Tripled Meetings

content.text: Week 1: ICP workshop, KB ingestion, LinkedIn auth. Week 2: pilot campaign review + adjustments. Week 3: multi-channel automation and analytics hand-off.
